messages.subject: Need help for research project
messages.msgSnippet: I am doing a research project for one of my classes, and need to interview a japanese person to obtain my primary sources. If you are Japanese, and don t mind
messages.messageBody:
I am doing a research project for one of my classes, and need to
interview a japanese person to obtain my primary sources. If you are
Japanese, and don't mind answering a few questions, please write back
to me, and I will conduct an interview via post.

My email address is planetsamir@...

Thanks,
Samir
